data.title: West, Speedy - Guitar Spectacular - CD
data.text:
LIMITED QUANTITIES!

There are really quite a few good steel guitar players around these days. But, as any dyed-in-the-wool fan of guitar music will tell you, there is still one man who stands out head and shoulders (or should we say hands and fingers?) above all the rest.

That's the amazing Speedy West, whose brilliant and dynamic stylings have made him the undisputed "king" of the amplified steel guitar. In this album, appropriately titled Guitar Spectacular, Speedy offers a dozen spectacular reasons for his success. The tunes are all originals, written by Speedy especially for the 24-stringed console he plays like nobody else in the world. Some of them are played at breathtaking tempos with Speedy's lightning fingers moving at a dazzling pace. But contrasted with these "wild West" swingers are several slow and dreamy "mood" numbers, offering a convincing demonstration of the shimmering and beautiful sounds that are possible on this versatile instrument as played by its true master: the incomparable Speedy West!
